property_name: Plotted Land For Sale in Bageshwori, Bhaktapur
description: The land for sale is in Bageshwori, Bhaktapur. The plotted land has 5 plots left with land area of 4 to 6 aana. The land is perfect for the residential area because it is close to greenery and peaceful surrounding. The land also has facility of electricity, water line, and drainage system. So, please do not miss this opportunity to own these lands.
